biotools.summary:
This forward looking GA4GH Beacon interface implements Beacon Project roadmap features beyond in close coordination with the official API. The use of the Beacon protocol is demonstrated on to of the Progenetix cancer genome data collection.
While not primarily documented for independent deployment, the Beacon+ code base can be coopted for developing genomic information resources in biomedical settings.

bioschemas.name: Beacon+
